description: Number of one-sided polyominoes with n cells.
comments: A000988 is the main entry for this sequence.
references: W. F. Lunnon, Counting multidimensional polyominoes. Computer Journal 18 (1975), no. 4, pp. 366-367.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: N. J. A. Sloane, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..45
crossrefs: A000988 (= a(n) + 1) is another version. A column of A195738.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: Edited by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Sep 23 2011.
